mapper.select: SELECT l.lesson_img, l.lesson_title, l.lesson_cate, l.lesson_num FROM (SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id= #{user_id}) u JOIN lesson l ON u.user_cate = l.lesson_cate WHERE l.lesson_onoff = 1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;
SELECT lesson.lesson_img, lesson.lesson_cate, lesson.lesson_title, lesson.lesson_num FROM lesson WHERE lesson.lesson_onoff = 1 ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;

SELECT l.lesson_img, l.lesson_num, l.lesson_title, ROUND(AVG(r.review_sugar), 2) AS review_score FROM lesson l JOIN review r ON l.lesson_num = r.review_lesson_num WHERE lesson_onoff = 1 GROUP BY l.lesson_img, l.lesson_title ORDER BY review_score DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT lesson_img, lesson_title, lesson_date, lesson_num FROM lesson WHERE lesson_onoff = 1 and lesson_date > adddate(DATE(SYSDATE()), INTERVAL -28 day) ORDER BY RAND()
SELECT lesson_img, lesson_title, lesson_date, lesson_num FROM lesson WHERE lesson_onoff = 1 and lesson_date > adddate(DATE(SYSDATE()), INTERVAL -28 day) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4;
